mapper.select: SELECT U.id AS user_id , U.status , U.nickname , U.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = U.file_id ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1) AS file_url , U.created_at , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY WHERE seller_id = U.id OR buyer_id = U.id) AS completed_trade_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_USER_COMPLIMENT WHERE complimented_user_id = U.id) AS compliment_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM USER_BAN_HISTORY WHERE user_id = U.id) AS ban_count FROM USER U WHERE U.id = #{userId}
